scripts.install: npm i @cloudflare/wrangler -g; npm install -g dotenv-cli; sudo gem install bundler; bundle install
scripts.dev: bundle exec jekyll build --watch --trace & dotenv -f .env -- wrangler dev --env=production
scripts.staging: npm run jekyll-build; dotenv -f .env -- wrangler publish --env=staging
scripts.publish: npm run jekyll-build; dotenv -f .env -- wrangler publish --env=production
